text:
No, Donald Trump was not photographed wearing “adult diapers,” contrary to a purely speculative and distasteful report about the president of the United States. A certain webloid took the time to peddle this ridiculousness, and now Gossip Cop is going to take the time to call it out. There’s actually a rather big inaccuracy in […]

title: Donald Trump Does Not Wear “Adult Diapers,” Despite Speculation
